templateVersions.content: Objective: [Clearly state what you want to achieve in Salesforce. Example: “Generate Apex code to create a trigger that updates a related object.”] Context: Org type: [Production / Sandbox / Developer Edition] Clouds used: [Sales Cloud / Service Cloud / Experience Cloud / etc.] Relevant objects: [List standard or custom objects, e.g. Account, Custom_Object__c] Current setup: [Describe any existing automation, fields, or logic that the prompt should be aware of] Technical Constraints: [Governor limits, dependency on managed packages, Flow vs Apex preference, etc.] [Code must be bulk-safe / follow best practices / use SOQL efficiently, etc.] Output Format: [Apex class / Flow steps / SOQL query / Metadata explanation / Visualforce component / Lightning Web Component] [Include: comments / test class / XML metadata if needed] Example Prompt: "Create an Apex trigger on Opportunity that updates a custom field on the related Account when the Opportunity is marked as Closed Won. The trigger must be bulk-safe and include a test class with at least 75% coverage."
